item.description:
Might as well kick off this mass airport tour on a full bellie! lets zip on down to KPYM and load up on some great tasting pancakes, check our weight and ballance then head out, maybe stop at a few of the airports on the way back to kick this contest off!

http://www.navmonster.com/wx/KFIT-KPYM-10

Check in on the apron in front of Hangar Building 13 for a wheels up departure at 8:30

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Plane Jane's cranberry pancakes are calling!!
